subject: Hockey, Ice
Madison Square Garden
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Wayne Gretzky had not been to the Garden in any official hockey role since his farewell night in 1999. Sunday he was back as coach of the Coyotes enjoying a solid win.
snippet: Wayne Gretzky had not been to the Garden in any official hockey role since his farewell night in 1999. Sunday he was back as coach of the Coyotes enjoying a solid win.
